security: The cable discusses the subject Calvin Rakebrand's cooperation with emigre channels ODENVY and KUBARK in an investigation related to KGB surfacing. It also mentions his current activities in Mexico, including a potential connection to a journalist. Disclosing these details could compromise ongoing investigations, expose intelligence-gathering methods, and reveal sources.
summary: A cable identifies Calvin E. Rakebrand as cooperating with ODENVY and KUBARK in an investigation related to KGB activities, and mentions his current activities in Mexico, including a potential connection with a journalist.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret cable discusses Calvin E. Rakebrand, identified as a PROGD who has been cooperating with IF emigre channels ODENVY and KUBARK in a continuing investigation since 1960 related to KGB activities. Rakebrand is currently in Mexico studying Spanish in connection with a plan to develop a journalist exploit in the LA area and is believed to be associated with a mistress rather than his wife. The message specifies that no station action is required and that ODENVY will have no contact in Mexico.
title: KUDESK ZROCEAN - Calvin E. Rakebrand Activities in Mexico
